special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: The draegloth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The draegloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). The draegloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: 
At will: darkness 1/day each: confusion, dancing lights.faerie fire

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draegloth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.
